lines.text: Where do you come from, Percy?
Ohio, huh. I had some clients from Ohio once. Didn't sound like you do.
Well I wouldn't mind coming from someplace else, if that doesn't suit you.
The way to a man's heart is through his stomach. Or somewhere in that vicinity.
Who do you supposed is gonna keep an eye on her?
Well, if she's working at the Spitfire, I'd guess everyone.
Until I forget my name or start drooling at the mouth, I'll thank you to let me make my own decisions.
You can say that twice and mean it.
Most folks would rather hear a colorful lie over the truth any day.

[as bags of mail for the essay contest are deposited in the diner]
Holy Moses.

I just gotta find someplace to give my boy a chance, Mrs. Ferguson. That's all he really needs, just a chance. And from reading what you all wrote, well, I got to wishing maybe your town would be that place.
You sound like you're from the South.
Things ain't always what they sound.

[answering call]
Maine tourist office, how can I help you today?
